snippet: The chief executive of AMC Networks, Josh Sapan, is parting with some of his items, described in a new book, and lending others for display.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; AMC Networks chief executive Josh Sapan is parting with some of his large collection of antiques, and exhibiting others; Judaica dealers and auction houses are broadening category to attract new buyers; Musee Guimet in Paris has lined galleries with expensively repaired casts for exhibition Angkor: The Birth of a Myth, Louis Delaporte and Cambodia.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of AMC Networks, Josh Sapan, is parting with some of his items, described in a new book, and lending others for display.

headline.main: Josh Sapan’s ‘Big Picture,’ on Group Photos as Collectibles
headline.print_headline: Josh Sapan’s ‘Big Picture,’ on Group Photos as Collectibles
